name: Block Puzzle: Wood Winner
description:
Block Puzzle: Wood Winner is a wood style block game. Easy to play, but difficult to be a master. More wood blocks crush, more score you will get. Try it and you will love this block puzzle game.

How to play block puzzle:
- Place the WOOD pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
- Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board, so be more careful.

Features of the block puzzle:
- Hours of fun, exciting to play.
- It has all features of great puzzle block game.
- Innovation of classic brick and block puzzle game.
- No time limits.
- Totally free and classic wood block puzzle.
- You can play anytime and anywhere!

We really hope you enjoy it!
Join more than 1 million lovers of the wonderful wood block game and become the real master!
